conclusion: Preliminary objection rejected (victim);Violation of Art. 6-1;Not necessary to examine Art. 6-1 (prompt trial);Not necessary to examine Art. 6-2;Violation of Art. 8;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses partial award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF FUNKE v. FRANCE - [Russian Translation]
